title: Apple Watch Version Please
text: Works as advertised.  It would be nice to have the ability to verify through the Apple Watch.

title: Security always needed
text: Enjoy feeling like my account is more secure!

title: Great, love it!
text: It Syncs across IOS and Android. Thank you for the ease of access of the app. As Elon Musk said all authenticators are more secure than getting your code from SMS text. And I believe him, because I never had a security breach with Microsoft. But have with phone numbers. also, I recently upgraded to the iPhone 14 Pro Max. and all of the accounts that I had in the Authenticator app automatically switched over to my new iPhone.

title: It’s good … but they haven’t figured out how to prevent theft yet.
text: Yes. I’m serious. I’ve had 5 (that’s FIVE) MS Authenticators stolen from me. It wouldn’t be so bad really if only they didn’t steal my backups too. I guess MS, Goo & Apple all will continue to pretend there is no “Hacker crisis” for as long as they can….Not a one of them expressed any concern or apology…

title: Authenticator option
text: I always have to us the “ I can’t use my authenticator option” for verification. It could be an issue because it’s linked to my school account

title: Great app, needs support for Apple Watch
text: Would love to see better integration with the Apple Watch.  Many times I need to get up to get my phone to type in a number.  Would rather prefer to do this from the watch.
